backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features that update the header logo and favicon, including affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted list of short summaries for major frontend components, pages, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes, plus base style resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and referencing the updated v2 app icon and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app wiring TanStack Router, React Query, authentication gate, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication wrapper that shows a login screen or loading state before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Main layout shell with header (updated logo), navigation, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Simple navigation bar showing only the Dashboard tab with active-route styling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Large modal form for creating a new resident, handling dynamic lists and validation before submitting a resident summary.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Modal for editing resident details with form state, validation, physician list management, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays resident details in a card with actions for viewing profile, discharging, and deleting.
Renders the header for the resident dashboard with a title and add‑resident button.
Provides UI controls for filtering residents by room and sorting by various fields.
Shows a grid of ResidentCard components or a fallback message if none match filters.
Displays KPI cards summarizing total, active, and discharged residents.
Renders tabs to filter residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Shows a placeholder card listing missing reference materials and links to a checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend‑related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom light/dark theme variables plus print‑specific CSS.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that displays resident KPIs, filtering/sorting controls, resident grid, and an add-resident dialog using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data and a helper to fetch medications for a resident by ID.
Generates mock resident profile data from basic resident info, including parsed room/bed and contact details.
Mock resident list with basic attributes like room, age, status, physicians, and medication counts.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions for filtering, sorting, KPI computation, and extracting unique rooms from resident data.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Resident profile page showing detailed info, medications, editing, and print options using mock profile data and router params.
Print-only component that renders resident profile and medication data into a structured printable report.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: UI page listing required reference materials and screenshots needed to recreate the Maui Lane Care Home interface.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing the current build state, features, and versions for the Maui Lane Care Home application.
